Injury: Selected by the Vegas Golden Knights from the Vancouver Canucks in the NHL Expansion Draft.
Missed the last 14 regular season games (upper body injury).
Signed by the Vancouver Canucks to a three-year contract extension.
Loaned to the Norfolk Admirals (AHL) for conditioning.
Missed the last 6 regular season and first playoff games (lower body injury).
Signed by the Anaheim Ducks to a four-year contract extension.
Signed by the Philadelphia Flyers to an entry-level contract.
